message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.GR, cs.NA, cs.SI 

The paper deals with convolutional neural networks on meshes, which are commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) applications. The proposed method involves utilizing geometric information of the mesh, which falls under the category of computational geometry (cs.CG) and graph theory (cs.GR). Additionally, the paper introduces a message passing scheme, which is a common technique in network analysis (cs.NA) and information theory (cs.IT). Finally, the paper discusses the expressivity of the proposed model, which is a topic of interest in statistical learning theory (cs.SI).
